meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a servant.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, servanthoods are highly respected.
meanings.sent2: She took on the servanthoods with grace and humility.
meanings.sent3: The cat believed the servanthoods of the humans were to serve her every whim.
meanings.sent4: The servanthoods of the loyal knights were evident in their unwavering dedication to the king.
meanings.sent5: The servanthoods of the bees in the hive showcased their incredible teamwork and unity.

meanings.definition: The duties or responsibilities of a servant.
meanings.sent1: His servanthoods included cleaning, cooking, and running errands.
meanings.sent2: The servanthoods of the butler were carried out with precision and efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The robot's servanthoods were to assist humans in their daily tasks.
meanings.sent4: She embraced her servanthoods with a sense of purpose and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The servanthoods of the maid encompassed maintaining the cleanliness of the entire house.
